Header.achieve_goals: Achieve your goals with ease at Nordic International University

about.paragraph1: Nordic International University is the only private university in Central Asia that carries out its educational activities in cooperation with the Nordic European countries, in particular Finland
about.paragraph2: The University is rightly considered to be the first foundation of educational cooperation between Finland and Uzbekistan, as well as the first educational cluster of Finnish higher education in Uzbekistan.

opportunities.title: International Diploma
opportunities.description: Our graduates receive a diploma that is recognized both in Uzbekistan and Europe.

opportunities.title: Qualified teachers
opportunities.description: Our students benefit from classes taught by a carefully selected faculty, comprising professors from both local institutions and European universities.

opportunities.title: Study Abroad Programs
opportunities.description: The university provides its students with the opportunity to participate in educational programs organized in Finland.

opportunities.title: Double Degree
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to study on double and joint degree programs at Nordic University in cooperation with Karelia University of Applied Sciences in Finland.

opportunities.title: Work & Travel
opportunities.description: Nordic University offers students the opportunity to work in Europe during the summer, which allows them to earn money to cover the contract.

majors.03: World economy and international economic relations

majors.04: Theory and methodology of teaching and education (elementary education)
majors.05: Theory and methodology of teaching and education (preschool education)

questions.question: Is the university diploma recognized?
questions.answer: Graduates of the university are awarded a diploma of established format, which is fully valid within the territory of Uzbekistan. No nostrification of the diploma is required. It serves as a basis for employment in both public and private organizations. Additionally, there is an opportunity to obtain an international  double degree qualification diploma, recognized in both Uzbekistan and Finland.

questions.question: Does the university possess a license?
questions.answer: The International Nordic University commenced its activities based on license No. 034528, issued by the State Inspectorate for Quality Control of Education under the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan on August 8, 2022.

questions.question: Is an IELTS certificate or other foreign language proficiency required for admission?
questions.answer: The possession of a language certificate is not a mandatory requirement for admission. However, if such a certificate is available, it may provide an advantage during the entrance examinations. The curriculum includes provisions for language study throughout the educational process.

questions.question: Where is the university located?
questions.answer: Address: Tashkent city, Chilonzor district, Bunyodkor street, house 8/2.

questions.question: How can one obtain the contract?
questions.answer: Following online registration on the university's website, the admissions committee reviews the student's documents and subsequently sends the contract.

questions.question: What is the timeframe for payment of the contract amount?
questions.answer: Upon receiving the contract, it is necessary to make a payment of 25% within 25 days.

questions.question: Is it possible to pay the contract amount in installments?
questions.answer: The contract amount can be paid at the beginning of the academic year and throughout the year, allowing for division into 2 or 4 payments.

questions.question: Can students combine their studies with work?
questions.answer: Students are given the opportunity to work in their free time from classes, without interfering with the educational process.

footer.address: Tashkent city, Shaikhontohur district, Sebzor street, 22-a
